query.statement:
MERGE INTO SAPHEE.ZCST950N AS A USING ( SELECT ARA ,BSU ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.ZMUSAOCNT2 > '00' AND A.PJTM = '' AND A.PJTU = '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) MBQ ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.MON < 2 AND A.ZMUSAOCNT2 > '00' AND A.PJTM = '' AND A.PJTU = '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) MBQ_1 ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.MON >= 2 AND A.MON < 4 AND A.ZMUSAOCNT2 > '00' AND A.PJTM = '' AND A.PJTU = '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) MBQ_3 ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.MON >= 4 AND A.MON < 6 AND A.ZMUSAOCNT2 > '00' AND A.PJTM = '' AND A.PJTU = '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) MBQ_6 ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.MON >= 6 AND A.ZMUSAOCNT2 > '00' AND A.PJTM = '' AND A.PJTU = '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) MBQ_7 ,SUM(CASE WHEN (A.PJTM > '' OR A.PJTU > '') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) MGQ ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.PJTM > '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) MGQ1 ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.PJTU > '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) UGQ FROM (
SELECT A.PJT ,A.HNO ,CASE WHEN A.IKD > #GDATE# THEN C.CS157_CAB ELSE A.ARA END ARA ,CASE WHEN A.IKD > #GDATE# THEN C.CS157_CHB ELSE A.BSU END BSU ,A.BGT ,A.USD ,A.PJTM ,A.PJTMI ,A.PJTU ,A.IGD ,SAPHEE.MONTH_BETWEEN( A.IGD,CAST(#GDATE# AS VARCHAR(8)),'2') MON ,A.ISD ,A.ZMUSAOCNT2
FROM ( SELECT A.PJT ,A.HNO ,MAX(A.ARA ) ARA ,MAX(A.BSU ) BSU ,MAX(A.BGT ) BGT ,MAX(A.USD ) USD ,MAX(A.PJTM ) PJTM ,MAX(A.PJTMI ) PJTMI ,MAX(A.PJTU ) PJTU ,MAX(A.IGD ) IGD ,MAX(A.ISD ) ISD ,MAX(A.ZMUSAOCNT2 ) ZMUSAOCNT2 ,MIN(F.CS157_IKD) IKD FROM ( SELECT B.CS101_PJT PJT ,B.CS101_HNO HNO ,MAX(B.CS101_ARA) ARA ,MAX(B.CS101_BSU) BSU ,MIN(B.CS101_IGD) IGD ,MIN(B.CS101_ISD) ISD ,MIN(VALUE(A.CS116_BGT,'')) BGT ,MIN(VALUE(C.CS126_USD,'')) USD ,MIN(VALUE(D.CS116_PJT,'')) PJTM ,MIN(VALUE(I.CS116_PJT,'')) PJTMI ,MIN(VALUE(E.CS126_PJT,'')) PJTU ,MAX(Y.ZMUSAOCNT2) ZMUSAOCNT2 FROM SAPHEE.ZCST101 B INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 Y ON B.MANDT = Y.MANDT AND B.CS101_PJT = Y.POSID AND B.CS101_PJT||B.CS101_HNO = Y.POSID_1 AND (ZMUSAOCNT > '00' OR ZMUSAOCNT2 > '00' )
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST116 A ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS116_PJT = B.CS101_PJT AND A.CS116_HNO = B.CS101_HNO AND A.CS116_PST = 'A6' AND A.CS116_GND = 'B' AND A.CS116_BST <= #GDATE# LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST126 C ON C.MANDT = B.MANDT AND C.CS126_PJT = B.CS101_PJT AND C.CS126_HNO = B.CS101_HNO AND C.CS126_PST = 'A6' AND C.CS126_DDT = '' AND C.CS126_GND = 'D' AND C.CS126_ADT <= #GDATE# LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST116 I ON I.MANDT = B.MANDT AND I.CS116_PJT = B.CS101_PJT AND I.CS116_HNO = B.CS101_HNO AND I.CS116_PST = 'A6' AND I.CS116_GND = 'B' AND I.CS116_BST <= #GDATE# AND I.CS116_BGT <= #GDATE# AND I.CS116_BMT >= SUBSTR(#GDATE#,1,6)||'01' LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST116 D ON D.MANDT = B.MANDT AND D.CS116_PJT = B.CS101_PJT AND D.CS116_HNO = B.CS101_HNO AND D.CS116_PST = 'A6' AND D.CS116_GND = 'A' AND D.CS116_BST <= #GDATE# AND D.CS116_BGT <= #GDATE# AND D.CS116_BMT >= SUBSTR(#GDATE#,1,6)||'01' LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST126 E ON E.MANDT = B.MANDT AND E.CS126_PJT = B.CS101_PJT AND E.CS126_HNO = B.CS101_HNO AND E.CS126_PST = 'A6' AND E.CS126_DDT = '' AND E.CS126_GND = 'C' AND E.CS126_ADT <= #GDATE# AND E.CS126_USD <= #GDATE# AND E.CS126_UHJ >= SUBSTR(#GDATE#,1,6)||'01'
WHERE B.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND B.CS101_IGD <= #GDATE# AND SUBSTR(B.CS101_HNO,1,1) IN ('L','S','W','C') AND B.CS101_PST = 'A6' AND B.CS101_ARA > '' AND B.CS101_BSU > '' AND B.CS101_PJT NOT LIKE 'M%' AND B.MDATE <= #GDATE# GROUP BY B.CS101_PJT, B.CS101_HNO
) A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CS144_PJT PJT, CS144_HNO HNO, MAX(CS143_FSD) JHD FROM SAPHEE.ZCST144 A, SAPHEE.ZCST143 B WHERE A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS144_SEQ = B.CS143_SEQ AND A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.CS144_PST = 'A6' AND B.CS143_FSD <= #GDATE# AND B.CS143_FSD <= #GDATE# GROUP BY CS144_PJT, CS144_HNO ) B ON A.PJT = B.PJT AND A.HNO = B.HNO LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CS172_PJO PJO, CS172_HNO HNO, MAX(CS172_MDT) MDT FROM SAPHEE.ZCST172 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# GROUP BY CS172_PJO, CS172_HNO ) D ON A.PJT = D.PJO AND A.HNO = D.HNO
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST157 F ON F.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND F.CS157_PJT = A.PJT AND F.CS157_HNO = A.HNO
INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST111 E ON E.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.PJT = E.PJT AND A.HNO = E.HNO AND E.EXC = ''
WHERE (E.HST <> 'D' OR (E.HST = 'D' AND VALUE(D.PJO,'') > '')) AND (SUBSTR(VALUE(A.BGT,''),1,6) > SUBSTR(#GDATE#,1,6) OR VALUE(A.BGT,'') = '' OR A.PJTU != '') AND (VALUE(A.USD,'') > #GDATE# OR VALUE(A.USD,'') = '') AND (VALUE(B.JHD,'') > #GDATE# OR VALUE(B.JHD,'') = '') AND (VALUE(D.MDT,'') > #GDATE# OR VALUE(D.MDT,'') = '') AND A.ARA > ''
GROUP BY A.PJT, A.HNO
) A
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST157 C ON C.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND C.CS157_PJT = A.PJT AND C.CS157_HNO = A.HNO AND C.CS157_IKD = A.IKD
UNION ALL
SELECT B.CS101_PJT PJT ,B.CS101_HNO HNO ,B.CS101_ARA ARA ,B.CS101_BSU BSU ,'' BGT ,'' USD ,'' PJTM ,'' PJTMI ,'' PJTU ,B.CS101_IGD IGD ,SAPHEE.MONTH_BETWEEN( B.CS101_IGD,CAST(#GDATE# AS VARCHAR(8)),'2') MON ,B.CS101_ISD ISD ,Y.ZMUSAOCNT2
FROM SAPHEE.ZCST101 B INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 Y ON B.MANDT = Y.MANDT AND B.CS101_PJT = Y.POSID AND B.CS101_PJT||B.CS101_HNO = Y.POSID_1 AND (ZMUSAOCNT > '00' OR ZMUSAOCNT2 > '00' ) WHERE B.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND B.CS101_IGD <= #GDATE# AND SUBSTR(B.CS101_HNO,1,1) IN ('L','S','W','C') AND B.CS101_PST = 'A1' AND B.CS101_ARA > ''
AND B.CS101_PJT NOT LIKE 'M%' AND B.MDATE <= #GDATE#
) AS A
GROUP BY ARA, BSU
) AS B ON A.ARA = B.ARA AND A.BSU = B.BSU AND A.YYYYMM = #YYYYMM# AND A.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
WHEN MATCHED THEN
UPDATE SET MBQ = B.MBQ ,MBQ_1 = B.MBQ_1 ,MBQ_3 = B.MBQ_3 ,MBQ_6 = B.MBQ_6 ,MBQ_7 = B.MBQ_7 ,MGQ = B.MGQ ,MGQ1 = B.MGQ1 ,UGQ = B.UGQ
